name: Bluestreak
description:
"Welcome to the Bluestreak Ocean Cleaning Crew!! Are you ready to dive in?"

Join Captain Caden as the newest member on the Bluestreak Cleaning Crew. Dive to the depths of the ocean and help save the wild life by cleaning the underwater waste.

~ ~ ~    ><>    ~ ~ ~

Controls
WASD -> Turn player
Left mouse button -> Swim forward
Right mouse button -> Pick-up/Use radar

~ ~ ~    ><>    ~ ~ ~

Third place winner of the Taikai: A Game To Save The World 1 Month Game Jam
